subtitles.original: 変に今を煽り
subtitles.english: Stirring up the present in a strange way

subtitles.original: 嘘でもいいから
subtitles.english: Even if it's a lie

subtitles.original: どっか遠く君と二人
subtitles.english: Somewhere far away, just the two of us

subtitles.original: 甘いハッタリ
subtitles.english: A sweet bluff

subtitles.original: Don't stop the music, darling
subtitles.english: Don't stop the music, darling

subtitles.original: Don't stop the music, darling
subtitles.english: Don't stop the music, darling

subtitles.original: Don't stop the music, darling
subtitles.english: Don't stop the music, darling

subtitles.original: 凍りついた心には太陽を
subtitles.english: A sun for a frozen heart

subtitles.original: そして僕が君にとってそのポジションを
subtitles.english: And I want to be that for you

subtitles.original: そんなだいぶ傲慢な思い込みを
subtitles.english: An assumption quite arrogant like that

subtitles.original: こじらせてたんだよ ごめんね
subtitles.english: I've made it complicated, I'm sorry

subtitles.original: 笑ってやって
subtitles.english: Please laugh at it

subtitles.original: 火傷しそうなほどのポジティブの
subtitles.english: Of a positivity so hot it might burn

subtitles.original: 冷たさと残酷さに気付いたんだよ
subtitles.english: I noticed its coldness and cruelty

subtitles.original: きっと君に渡したいものは
subtitles.english: Surely, what I want to give you is

subtitles.original: もっとひんやり熱いもの
subtitles.english: Something more coolly hot

subtitles.original: 綺麗事じゃないけど 綺麗で揺るぎないもの
subtitles.english: Not just lip service, but something beautiful and unwavering

subtitles.original: 上辺よりも胸の奥の奥を温めるもの
subtitles.english: Something that warms deep within the heart rather than the surface

subtitles.original: 理想だけはあるけど
subtitles.english: I only have ideals, but

subtitles.original: 心のどこ探しても まるで見つからないんだよ
subtitles.english: No matter where I look in my heart, I can't find them at all

subtitles.original: 伝えたい 伝わらない その不条理が今
subtitles.english: I want to tell you, but it's not getting through; that absurdity is now

subtitles.original: きつく縛りつけるんだよ
subtitles.english: Binding me so tightly

subtitles.original: 臆病な僕の
subtitles.english: Of my cowardly self

subtitles.original: この一挙手一投足を
subtitles.english: Every single move I make

subtitles.original: 言葉はまるで雪の結晶 君にプレゼントしたくても
subtitles.english: Words are like snowflakes, even if I want to present them to you

subtitles.original: 夢中になればなるほどに 形は崩れ落ちて溶けていって
subtitles.english: The more absorbed I become, the more they crumble and melt away

subtitles.original: 消えてしまうけど
subtitles.english: And they disappear, but

subtitles.original: でも僕が選ぶ言葉が そこに託された思いが
subtitles.english: But the words I choose, the feelings entrusted to them

subtitles.original: 君の胸を震わすのを 諦められない
subtitles.english: I can't give up on making your heart tremble

subtitles.original: 「愛してる」よりも愛が届くまで
subtitles.english: Until a love greater than "I love you" reaches you

subtitles.original: もう少しだけ待ってて
subtitles.english: Wait just a little longer

subtitles.original: 薄すぎてただそばに立ってても
subtitles.english: Even if I'm just standing by your side

subtitles.original: 不必要に汗をかいてしまう僕なんかもう
subtitles.english: Someone like me who breaks into an unnecessary sweat

subtitles.original: どうしたって生温くて君を痛めつけてしまうのだろう
subtitles.english: No matter what, I'm lukewarm and probably end up hurting you

subtitles.original: 手のひらが熱いほど心は冷たいんでしょう
subtitles.english: The hotter the palms, the colder the heart must be, right?

subtitles.original: 冗談でもそんな残酷なこと言わないでよ
subtitles.english: Don't say such cruel things, even as a joke

subtitles.original: 別にいいんだけど
subtitles.english: I don't really mind, but

subtitles.original: 全人生をかけても ちゃんと覆させてよ
subtitles.english: Even if it takes my whole life, let me properly prove you wrong

subtitles.original: 救いたい 救われたい このイコ一ルが今
subtitles.english: I want to save, I want to be saved; this equation is now

subtitles.original: 優しく剥がしていくんだよ
subtitles.english: Gently peeling away

subtitles.original: 堅い論理 武装
subtitles.english: Hard logical armor

subtitles.original: プライドの過剰包装を
subtitles.english: Excessive packaging of pride

subtitles.original: 正しさよりも優しさが欲しい
subtitles.english: I want kindness more than correctness

subtitles.original: そしてそれを受け取れるのは イルミネーションみたいな
subtitles.english: And the only one who can receive it is like an illumination

subtitles.original: 不特定多数じゃなくて ただ一人 君であってほしい
subtitles.english: Not one of the unspecified many, but you and only you

subtitles.original: かじかんだ言葉で 荒れた日々を直そうとして
subtitles.english: Trying to fix the stormy days with numb words

subtitles.original: 過信しすぎた熱量で 引かれてしまったカ一テン
subtitles.english: The curtains that were drawn due to overconfident heat

subtitles.original: そんな失敗作を
subtitles.english: Such a failure

subtitles.original: 重ねて 重ねて 重ねて 見つけたいんだいつか
subtitles.english: I want to find it someday, piling them up, again and again

subtitles.original: 最高の正解と言える僕を
subtitles.english: The me that can be called the best answer

subtitles.original: 言葉はまるで雪の結晶 君にプレゼントしたとして
subtitles.english: Suppose I presented words to you like snowflakes

subtitles.original: 時間が経ってしまえば大抵 記憶からこぼれ落ちて溶けていって
subtitles.english: After some time passes, they usually spill from memory and melt away

subtitles.original: 消えてしまうけど
subtitles.english: And they disappear, but

subtitles.original: 絶えず僕らのスト一リ一に 添えられた字幕のように
subtitles.english: Like the subtitles constantly added to our story

subtitles.original: 思い返した時
subtitles.english: When looking back

subtitles.original: ふいに目をやる時に 君の胸を震わすもの
subtitles.english: Something that makes your heart tremble when you suddenly glance at it

subtitles.original: 探し続けたい 愛してるよりも愛が届くまで
subtitles.english: I want to keep searching until a love greater than "I love you" reaches you
